headline: 3 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Warren Buffett is a famous billionaire investor, and his trillion-dollar conglomerate, Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B), owns nearly 50 stocks in its portfolio.  Caveats aside, Berkshire Hathaway holds a variety of high-quality businesses, and several are good buys right now.  Among these are Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN), Pool Corp (NASDAQ: POOL), and Ulta Beauty (NASDAQ: ULTA).
